alert.note: Alert for Riverside; San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 25 at 12:41PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Southern California, including the following counties, in southern California, Riverside. In southwest California, San Diego. * WHEN...Until 245 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1240 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Anza, Hwy 79 Between Warner Springs And Oak Grove, Warner Springs, Hwy 79 Between Santa Ysabel And Warner Springs, Borrego Palm Canyon, Hwy S2 Between Hwy 79 And Hwy 78, Aguanga, Cahuilla Indian Reservation and Los Coyotes Indian Reservation. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
